minLength.description: min_length is the minimum length for password, should be no less than 8.

passwordRotation.description: password_rotation requires users to reset their password after the duration.

requireLetter.description: require_letter requires the password must contain at least one letter, regardless of upper case or lower case

requireNumber.description: require_number requires the password must contain at least one number.

requireResetPasswordForFirstLogin.description: require_reset_password_for_first_login requires users to reset their password after the 1st login.

requireSpecialCharacter.description: require_special_character requires the password must contain at least one special character.

requireUppercaseLetter.description: require_uppercase_letter requires the password must contain at least one upper case letter.
